name: Matsuro Paretto
storyline:
This is a game in which you spend seven cursed days with a painting girl.
Trapped in a dark studio, the protagonist relies on the records of past victims to color her paintings.
The game ends with an immediate dead end if you offend the difficult painting. Various endings will befall the player.
Will you be able to finish her?
summary: This game is a horror adventure game, released on February 19, 2020 by SleepingMuseum on Googleplay and Appstore.
